desc: EVOBD2 is a tiny smart display Plug & Play, simple to use and always available to show hidden information from your main car displays. Mount it on the dash, leave it there if you want and use it automatically!

layout.text:
Tiny smart display Plug & Play, simple to use and always available to show hidden information from your car.
Hyundai: Kona EV - IONIQ 5
Kia: Niro EV - Soul EV(2020+) - EV6
